name: Connection: Promise
description:
So... My name's Lindon.

Today I'm gonna hang out with my childhood friend, Triston.

For some reason, he keeps blushing and shaking, but I do think he's happy. However, he's also acting pretty strange, he has a knife with him, and keeps murmuring and whispering. That's kinda unnormal... Or even, disturbing I know I shoudn't suspect him, but... everything will be Ok, right?

*Try to survive in a dangerous date. you better think twice before you say something!

*The game is already completed, but that doesn't mean the end of the story. Follow me if you're interested.

*This game belong to the Connection series.
